name: Rainbow Cult
description: Rainbow Cult is a satirical office environment where each floor is based off a real-life event or controversy. Fight your way through 13 bosses and 3 unique playthroughs each with its own ending.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or higher Processor: SSE2 support required Memory: 8192 MB RAM Graphics: Shader model 4.0 required DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 700 MB available space
